name: New Bike Racing Tricky Stunt
description:
Play this addictive stunt game and perform your stunt riding skills to prove that you are the real trail bike racer. Enjoy impressive graphics and realistic control, which provide you best stunt bike gaming experience. This game is filled with free style action and bang stunts challenges.
Features:
- Impossible adventurous stunt tracks
- Stunning motorcycle riding experience
- Amazing stunt ramps and obstacles to jump off
- Realistic bike sound effects
- Different kinds of hurdles in the way on the impossible track
